channel.title: Rich Content on Sumz
channel.description: Recent content in Rich Content on Sumz

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Embedded Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. X Simple Shortcode <!-- {{< x user="GoHugoIO" id="1315233626070503424" >}} --> ``` ``` Vimeo Simple Shortcode {{< vimeo 146022717 >}} Youtube Simple Shortcode {{< youtube w7Ft2ymGmfc >}} Theme Custom Shortcodes These shortcodes are not Hugo built-ins, but are provided by the theme.
